statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_fees;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_fees WHERE sender_user_id = 100;
SELECT receiver_user_id, fee_percentage FROM transaction_fees WHERE fee_percentage > 0.5;
SELECT sender_user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_fees WHERE sender_user_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_fees WHERE fee_percentage BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY receiver_user_id ASC, transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_fees WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT sender_user_id, receiver_user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_fees WHERE fee_percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY fee_percentage DESC
SELECT transaction_id, sender_user_id, receiver_user_id, transaction_amount, fee_percentage FROM transaction_fees WHERE sender_user_id = 500 AND receiver_user_id = 700
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_fees WHERE receiver_user_id IN (600, 800, 1000)
SELECT AVG(fee_percentage) AS average_fee_percentage FROM transaction_fees
SELECT * FROM transaction;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT receiver_id, fee FROM transaction WHERE fee > 0.5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, fee FROM transaction WHERE sender_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, fee, fee_percentage, calculated_fee FROM fee_calculation WHERE transaction_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount > 100 AND fee < 10 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount+fee AS total_amount FROM transaction JOIN fee_calculation ON transaction.transaction_id = fee_calculation.transaction_id WHERE fee_percentage > 0.5;
SELECT receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_received FROM transaction GROUP BY receiver_id HAVING total_received > 5000 ORDER BY total_received DESC;
SELECT t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, fc.calculated_fee AS fee_amount FROM transaction t INNER JOIN fee_calculation fc ON t.transaction_id = fc.transaction_id WHERE fc.calculated_fee IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, fc.fee_percentage, fc.calculated_fee FROM transaction t LEFT JOIN fee_calculation fc ON t.transaction_id = fc.transaction_id WHERE fc.calculated_fee IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM transaction_fees;
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency, fee FROM transaction_fees ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, payment_amount, fee_amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, fee_amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 101 AND receiver_id = 102;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, payment_amount+fee_amount AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_fees GROUP BY payment_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, balance FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE balance > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, balance ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, username, email, balance FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT users.username, transactions.amount, transactions.fee FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE transactions.fee > (SELECT base_fee FROM fees WHERE fee_type='transfer')
SELECT users.username, payment_methods.method_name, payment_methods.fee_rate FROM users JOIN payment_methods ON users.user_id = payment_methods.user_id ORDER BY payment_methods.fee_rate DESC
SELECT username, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY username HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, balance FROM users ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT fee_id, fee_percentage, min_fee, max_fee FROM fees;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, t.amount, th.fee_amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN transactions_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE u.balance < 0 ORDER BY t.amount ASC;
SELECT u.username, SUM(t.amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_transaction_amount > 5000;

SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, tf.fee_id FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN transaction_fees tf ON t.transaction_id = tf.transaction_id WHERE tf.fee_id IS NOT NULL AND t.amount > 200 ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.min_fee, f.max_fee FROM transactions t JOIN fees f ON t.amount BETWEEN f.min_fee AND f.max_fee WHERE f.fee_percentage > 2.5 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
